mapper.select: SELECT p.board_id, p.post_id, p.title, p.display_name, p.contents, p.comments_count, p.created_date_time, p.updated_date_time, b.display_name AS board_display_name FROM post p, board b WHERE p.board_id = b.board_id AND p.board_id = #{board_id} ORDER BY p.created_date_time DESC

SELECT p.board_id, p.post_id, p.title, p.display_name, p.contents, p.comments_count, p.created_date_time, p.updated_date_time, b.display_name AS board_display_name FROM post p, board b WHERE p.board_id = b.board_id AND p.board_id = #{boardId} AND p.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title}, display_name = #{displayName}, contents = #{contents}, updated_date_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND post_id = #{postId}

UPDATE post SET comments_count = CASE WHEN (SELECT comments_count FROM post WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND post_id = #{postId}) > 0 THEN (SELECT comments_count FROM post WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND post_id = #{postId}) - 1 ELSE (SELECT comments_count FROM post WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND post_id = #{postId}) END WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND post_id = #{postId}
